fields.name: headers
fields.description: Request headers retrieved from the original `HTTP Request`

fields.name: contentType
fields.description: Content-type header value of the original `HTTP Request`

fields.name: content
fields.description: The received content

records.name: ListenerConfiguration
records.description: Provides a set of configurations for configure the underlying HTTP listener of the WebSub listener.

fields.name: target
fields.description:
The `string` resource URL for which discovery will be initiated to identify the hub and topic,
or a tuple `[hub, topic]` representing a discovered hub and a topic

fields.name: leaseSeconds
fields.description: The period for which the subscription is expected to be active

fields.name: callback
fields.description: The callback URL for subscriber-service

fields.name: secret
fields.description: The secret to be used for authenticated content distribution

fields.name: appendServiceUrl
fields.description: This flag notifies whether or not to append service-path to callback-url

fields.name: httpConfig
fields.description: The configuration for the hub client used to interact with the discovered/specified hub

fields.name: discoveryConfig
fields.description: HTTP client configurations for resource discovery

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic for which the subscription/unsubscription request is sent

fields.name: callback
fields.description: The callback which should be registered/unregistered for the subscription/unsubscription request sent

fields.name: leaseSeconds
fields.description: The lease period for which the subscription is expected to be active

fields.name: secret
fields.description: The secret to be used for authenticated content distribution with this subscription

records.name: SubscriptionChangeRequest
records.description: Record representing a WebSub subscription change request-body.

fields.name: hub
fields.description: The hub at which the subscription/unsubscription was successful

fields.name: topic
fields.description: The topic for which the subscription/unsubscription was successful

fields.name: response
fields.description: The response from the hub to the subscription/unsubscription request

records.name: SubscriptionChangeResponse
records.description: Record representing subscription/unsubscription details if a subscription/unsubscription request is successful.

fields.name: hubMode
fields.description: The `hub.mode` parameter (subscribe / unsubscribe)

fields.name: hubTopic
fields.description: The topic URL

fields.name: hubChallenge
fields.description: The `hub.challenge` parameter used for verification

fields.name: hubLeaseSeconds
fields.description: The `hub.lease_seconds` parameter used to validate the expiration of subscription

records.name: SubscriptionVerification
records.description: Record representing the subscription / unsubscription intent verification request-body.

records.name: SubscriptionVerificationSuccess
records.description: Record representing the subscription / unsubscription intent verification success.

parameters.name: expectedMediaTypes
parameters.description: The expected media types for the subscriber client

parameters.name: expectedLanguageTypes
parameters.description: The expected language types for the subscriber client

returnParameters.description: A `(hub, topic)` as a `(string, string)` if successful or else an `error` if not

remoteMethods.name: discoverResourceUrls
remoteMethods.description:
Discovers the URLs of the hub and topic defined by a resource URL.
```ballerina
[string, string] discoveryDetails = check discoveryServiceEp->discoverResourceUrls(expectedMediaTypes, expectedLanguageTypes);
```

parameters.name: publisherClientConfig
parameters.description: Optional `http:ClientConfiguration` to be used in the underlying `http:Client`

returnParameters.description: The `websub:DiscoveryService` or an `error` if the initialization failed

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initiliazes the `websub:DiscoveryService` endpoint.
```ballerina
websub:DiscoveryService discoveryServiceEp = check new ("https://sample.discovery.com");
```

parameters.name: expectedLanguageTypes
parameters.description: The expected language types for the subscriber client

returnParameters.description: A `(hub, topic)` as a `(string, string)` if successful or else an `error` if not

methods.name: discoverResourceUrls
methods.description:
Discovers the URLs of the hub and topic defined by a resource URL.
```ballerina
[string, string] discoveryDetails = check discoveryServiceEp->discoverResourceUrls(expectedMediaTypes, expectedLanguageTypes);
```

returnParameters.description: The `websub:DiscoveryService` or an `error` if the initialization failed

clients.name: DiscoveryService
clients.description: Represents resource-discovery service which identify the `hub` and `topic` from `resource-URL`.

parameters.name: subscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The request payload containing the subscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating that the subscription initiation was successful
or else an `error`

remoteMethods.name: subscribe
remoteMethods.description:
Sends a subscription request to the provided `hub`.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse response = check websubHubClientEP->subscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: unsubscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The request payload containing the unsubscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating that the unsubscription initiation was successful
or else an `error`

remoteMethods.name: unsubscribe
remoteMethods.description:
Sends an unsubscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse response = check websubHubClientEP->unsubscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL at which the subscription should be changed

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Optional `http:ClientConfiguration` for the underlying client

returnParameters.description: The `websub:SubscriptionClient` or an `error` if the initialization failed

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initializes the `websub:SubscriptionClient` instance.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionClient subscriptionClientEp = check new ("https://sample.hub.com");
```

parameters.name: subscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The request payload containing the subscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating that the subscription initiation was successful
or else an `error`

methods.name: subscribe

Sends a subscription request to the provided `hub`.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse response = check websubHubClientEP->subscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

parameters.name: unsubscriptionRequest
parameters.description: The request payload containing the unsubscription details

returnParameters.description:
The `websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse` indicating that the unsubscription initiation was successful
or else an `error`

methods.name: unsubscribe

Sends an unsubscription request to a WebSub Hub.
```ballerina
websub:SubscriptionChangeResponse response = check websubHubClientEP->unsubscribe(subscriptionRequest);
```

returnParameters.description: The `websub:SubscriptionClient` or an `error` if the initialization failed

clients.name: SubscriptionClient
clients.description: The HTTP based client for WebSub subscription and unsubscription.

parameters.name: subscriberService
parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process or else `()`

lifeCycleMethods.name: attach
lifeCycleMethods.description:
Attaches the provided `websub:SubscriberService` to the `websub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.attach('service, "/subscriber");
```

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: Port number or a `http:Listener` instance

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Custom `websub:ListenerConfiguration` to be provided to underlying HTTP Listener

returnParameters.description: The `websub:Listener` or an `error` if the initialization failed

methods.name: init
methods.description:
Initiliazes `websub:Listener` instance.
```ballerina
listener websub:Listener websubListenerEp = check new (9090);
```

parameters.name: subscriberService
parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process or else `()`

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Attaches the provided `websub:SubscriberService` to the `websub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.attach('service, "/subscriber");
```

parameters.name: subscriberService
parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to attach

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: Custom `websub:SubscriberServiceConfiguration` which should be incorporated into the provided Service

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The path of the Service to be hosted

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service attaching process or else `()`

methods.name: attachWithConfig

parameters.name: s
parameters.description: The `websub:SubscriberService` object to be detached

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the service detaching process or else `()`

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Detaches the provided `websub:SubscriberService` from the `websub:Listener`.
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.detach('service);
```

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener starting process or else `()`

methods.name: 'start
methods.description:
Starts the registered service programmatically..
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.'start();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Stops the service listener gracefully. Already-accepted requests will be served before connection closure.
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.gracefulStop();
```

returnParameters.description: An `error`, if an error occurred during the listener stopping process or else `()`

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description:
Stops the service listener immediately.
```ballerina
check websubListenerEp.immediateStop();
```

parameters.name: listenTo
parameters.description: Port number or a `http:Listener` instance

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Custom `websub:ListenerConfiguration` to be provided to underlying HTTP Listener

returnParameters.description: The `websub:Listener` or an `error` if the initialization failed

initMethod.name: init
initMethod.description:
Initiliazes `websub:Listener` instance.
```ballerina
listener websub:Listener websubListenerEp = check new (9090);
```
